title: The promise of chiral electrocatalysis for efficient and sustainable energy conversion and storage: a comprehensive review of the CISS effect and future directions
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00316G, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Kyunghee Chae, Nur Aqlili Riana Che Mohamad, Jeonghyeon Kim, Dong-Il Won, Zhiqun Lin, Jeongwon Kim, Dong Ha Kim
The integration of chirality, specifically through the chirality-induced spin selectivity (CISS) effect, into electrocatalytic processes represents a pioneering approach for enhancing the efficiency of energy conversion and storage systems.
